channel.title: Drops based on slayer task
channel.description: Okey so i wanna make it so when you have a slayer task, only the monsters from that task only will drop caskets. But how do i say in java like to check the slayertask and add casket drop to those monsters?

item.title: Drops based on slayer task
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Can you give us some more information about your server? It’d help us provide relevant information to you.

Basically, this is how you want to do it:

When the NPC dies, there’s a method of some form that handles the item drops. Inside that method, you want to check if the player has a slayer task. If they do, check if the NPC killed is equal to that of their slayer task. If it is, use a random method (or similar) to generate the chance of the player getting a casket drop. Check if that value generated is greater than or equal to a number you pick (Like player has a 1-100 chance, they need to roll a 98 or higher to get it, leaving only about a 3% chance). Again, if it is, then you drop the casket and send any message if wanted.
Then underneath that you can handle the regular drops, if you want the player to still have access to those.

It wasn’t very specific because I don’t know what you’re working with.
